title: Foundation in Microbiology 8th Edition

Foundation in Microbiology 8th

eText: ISBN-10 0-07-734277-1, ISBN-13 978-0-07-734277-7
Print: ISBN-10 0-07-337529-2, ISBN-13 978-0-07-337529-8
Author(s): Talaro, Kathleen Park; Chess, Barry


Talaro/Chess: Foundations in Microbiology is an allied health microbiology text for non-science majors with a taxonomic approach to the disease chapters. It offers an engaging and accessible writing style through the use of tools such as case studies and analogies to thoroughly explain difficult microbiology concepts. We are so excited to offer a robust learning program with student-focused learning activities, allowing the student to manage their learning while you easily manage their assessment.
